1 1 1 4 96 509 155 632 178 symmetry.

1 1 1 6 96 719 153 788 178 again,
1 1 1 7 96 800 160 830 172 we

1 1 2 3 96 345 185 388 204 this
1 1 2 4 96 400 184 461 204 effect

1 2 1 1 91 171 279 195 296 E.

1 2 1 5 96 432 279 545 296 direction

2 1 1 3 96 300 356 330 368 we

2 1 1 7 96 579 349 616 368 the
2 1 1 8 96 628 349 733 368 direction
2 1 1 9 96 744 348 767 368 of

7 1 4 5 96 1226 249 1285 267 main

7 1 6 6 96 1237 312 1289 331 This
7 1 6 7 96 1298 313 1471 336 approximation

7 1 6 9 96 1504 312 1560 331 valid
7 1 7 1 96 882 346 903 363 at

19 1 1 1 64 725 1610 742 1633 1,

20 1 1 1 96 178 1698 247 1717 where
20 1 1 2 96 259 1705 289 1717 we
20 1 1 3 96 302 1698 355 1717 have
20 1 1 4 96 367 1698 432 1717 taken
20 1 1 5 96 443 1698 480 1717 the
20 1 1 6 96 493 1705 540 1717 zero
20 1 1 7 96 552 1700 699 1722 temperature
20 1 1 8 95 711 1698 773 1722 limit,
20 1 1 9 96 787 1698 830 1717 and
20 1 2 1 67 151 1737 177 1753 €r
20 1 2 2 91 195 1734 212 1750 <
20 1 2 3 93 228 1730 240 1750 0
20 1 2 4 90 256 1729 395 1756 (hole-doped
20 1 2 5 90 408 1729 493 1756 WSM).
20 1 2 6 96 509 1730 603 1754 Besides,
20 1 2 7 97 619 1730 650 1749 for
20 1 2 8 96 664 1730 784 1755 simplicity,
20 1 2 9 97 800 1737 830 1749 we
20 1 3 1 96 151 1762 204 1781 have
20 1 3 2 96 218 1762 328 1787 neglected
20 1 3 3 96 342 1762 379 1790 the
20 1 3 4 96 393 1761 519 1787 self-energy
20 1 3 5 96 533 1762 651 1782 correction
20 1 3 6 97 665 1764 688 1781 to
20 1 3 7 97 701 1762 739 1781 the
20 1 3 8 96 752 1768 830 1787 energy
20 1 4 1 96 151 1794 226 1818 bands,
20 1 4 2 96 241 1801 265 1813 so
20 1 4 3 92 277 1794 326 1813 that
20 1 4 4 33 342 1792 476 1823 |B,(ky,kz)|
20 1 4 5 77 492 1799 516 1813 >
20 1 4 6 0 533 1792 675 1823 |B,(kj,k)|.
20 1 4 7 96 696 1794 734 1814 We
20 1 4 8 96 747 1794 830 1813 remind
20 1 5 1 96 151 1826 187 1845 the
20 1 5 2 96 205 1826 279 1845 reader
20 1 5 3 96 296 1826 344 1845 that
20 1 5 4 96 362 1826 399 1845 the
20 1 5 5 96 417 1826 518 1851 integrals
20 1 5 6 96 535 1832 584 1845 over
20 1 5 7 96 601 1828 711 1845 momenta
20 1 5 8 88 728 1833 763 1845 are
20 1 5 9 88 781 1833 829 1845 con-
20 1 6 1 96 151 1858 246 1877 strained
20 1 6 2 96 256 1858 284 1883 by
20 1 6 3 96 293 1858 330 1877 the
20 1 6 4 96 339 1858 450 1877 condition
20 1 6 5 0 462 1856 498 1884 |B,
20 1 6 6 0 506 1856 546 1887 (ky,
20 1 6 7 0 556 1856 596 1884 k2)|

20 1 6 9 95 665 1856 700 1884 (cf.
20 1 6 10 95 715 1858 752 1882 Eq.
20 1 6 11 25 762 1848 828 1895 88).
20 2 1 1 57 178 1889 284 1913 Equation
20 2 1 2 57 291 1880 336 1924 (47)
20 2 1 3 96 351 1890 408 1914 gives
20 2 1 4 96 422 1889 459 1908 the
20 2 1 5 96 473 1889 625 1908 electron-hole
20 2 1 6 93 639 1889 757 1908 excitation
20 2 1 7 92 771 1895 829 1908 ener-
20 2 2 1 96 151 1922 194 1946 gies
20 2 2 2 96 204 1921 371 1946 corresponding
20 2 2 3 91 381 1923 404 1940 to
20 2 2 4 91 414 1928 437 1940 m
20 2 2 5 94 447 1930 465 1936 =
20 2 2 6 96 475 1922 494 1945 0,
20 2 2 7 96 506 1923 528 1940 at
20 2 2 8 96 538 1921 575 1940 the
20 2 2 9 96 585 1921 653 1946 valley
20 2 2 10 82 663 1928 683 1940 7.
20 2 2 11 96 698 1921 830 1946 Proceeding
20 2 3 1 96 151 1953 172 1972 in
20 2 3 2 96 183 1953 220 1972 the
20 2 3 3 96 231 1960 289 1972 same
20 2 3 4 96 300 1960 349 1978 way,
20 2 3 5 96 361 1960 392 1972 we
20 2 3 6 96 402 1952 447 1972 find
20 2 3 7 96 457 1953 506 1972 that
20 2 3 8 96 517 1953 554 1972 the
20 2 3 9 96 565 1954 683 1972 excitation
20 2 3 10 96 693 1954 787 1978 energies
20 2 3 11 96 798 1952 830 1972 for
20 2 4 1 93 151 1985 187 2004 the
20 2 4 2 92 198 1992 221 2004 m
20 2 4 3 95 231 1994 249 2000 =
20 2 4 4 96 260 1986 292 2004 +1
20 2 4 5 96 304 1985 405 2004 channels
20 2 4 6 95 416 1987 473 2004 must
20 2 4 7 96 484 1985 540 2010 obey
